meanings.definition: The heart or innermost part of something.

meanings.definition: A musical note that is a half step lower than the corresponding natural note.
meanings.sent1: The composer added a beautiful cor to the melody, creating a melancholic tone.

meanings.sent4: Her voice hit the cor perfectly, resonating throughout the concert hall.
